name: In A Flash (banjo)
description:
Coming June 2021

Ever miss playing those Flash strategy and defense classics like Warlords: Rise of Demons and Age of War? Do you like retro-style arcade games that you can play with your friends? In A Flash is a fast paced, rhythmic battle between 2 players that's inspired by two bygone eras of video games. Currently in Closed Beta.

Features:
  • Fast-paced arcade-y battles
  • Singleplayer battles vs AI
  • Local Multiplayer (2 Players)
  • Unit upgrades and strategic attack and defense
  • Retro music
  • Tutorial
  • Night mode & customizable color schemes
Possible Future Updates

These depend on player feedback and how interested people are in these features. Let me know what interests you in the comments!

  • Full singleplayer campaign with multiple types of enemies to face
  • More unit types and upgrades
  • More music
  • More color schemes & themes

What would you like to see in In A Flash?
